metadata.title: CVE-2013-0232 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
includes/functions.php in ZoneMinder Video Server 1.24.0, 1.25.0, andearlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shellmetacharacters in the (1) runState parameter in the packageControlfunction; or (2) key or (3) command parameter in the setDeviceStatusX10function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.26.5-1ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.26.5-1ubuntu3').
